Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to authorizing the county of Greene to impose an additional mortgage recording tax in relation to extending the effectiveness thereof
Summary: Extends the effective date which authorizes the county of Greene to impose an additional mortgage recording tax.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 218 of the laws of 2009 amending the tax law relating to authorizing the county of Greene to impose an additional mortgage recording tax, in relation to extending the effectiveness thereof
